ProductCopies.calldescription: Generates yield by running an automated {{asset}} covered call strategy.
ProductCopies.putdescription: Generates yield by running an automated {{asset}} put selling strategy.
ProductCopies.callstrategy: The vault earns yield on its {{asset}} deposits by running a weekly automated covered call strategy. The vault reinvests the yield earned back into the strategy, effectively compounding the yields for depositors over time.
ProductCopies.putstrategy: {{vault}} earns yield on its {{collateralAsset}} deposits by running a weekly automated {{asset}} put-selling strategy, where the put options are collateralized by {{collateralAsset}}. The vault reinvests the yield it earns back into the strategy, effectively compounding the yields for depositors over time.
